<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=5824) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=657" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 78 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[animal instinct](/Instincts.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

Your proficiency in unarmored defense increases to expert. When you are raging and unarmored, your skin transforms into a thick hide. You gain a +2 item bonus to AC (+3 if you have the [greater juggernaut class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=2)). The thickness of your hide gives you a Dexterity modifier cap to your AC of +3. This item bonus to AC is cumulative with [_armor potency_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2785) runes on your [explorer's clothing](/Armor.aspx?ID=39), [_mystic armor_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1611), and [_bands of force_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3058).
